questions.question: What does polymorphism mean in Greek?
questions.explanation: Polymorphism means many forms or shapes.

questions.question: What type of polymorphism occurs at compile time?
questions.explanation: Compile-time polymorphism is resolved during compilation.

questions.question: What is another name for compile-time polymorphism?
What feature implements compile-time polymorphism?
questions.explanation: Method overloading resolves methods at compile time.

questions.question: What type of polymorphism occurs at runtime?
questions.explanation: Runtime polymorphism resolves methods during execution.

questions.question: What keyword in C++ enables runtime polymorphism?
questions.explanation: Virtual functions allow dynamic method resolution.

questions.question: What differentiates overloaded methods?
questions.explanation: Overloaded methods have different parameter lists.

questions.question: What must be identical in method overriding?
questions.explanation: Overridden methods must have the same signature.

questions.question: What is polymorphism that works without type checking?
questions.explanation: Duck typing focuses on behavior rather than type.
